articles.description: The president is scheduled to be back at the White House on Wednesday after vacationing in Delaware. His administration is expected to make news on domestic and international issues.

articles.title: Ukraine says Russian 'shackles' worse than missiles six months after invasion
articles.description: Ukraine was "reborn" when Russia invaded six months ago, President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Wednesday, marking 31 years of his country's independence from the Moscow-controlled Soviet Union with a vow to drive Russian forces out completely.

articles.author: Andrea Vacchiano
articles.title: Tennessee helicopter crash leaves state trooper, sheriff’s deputy dead: 'A very tragic day'
articles.description: Two law enforcement officials were killed in a helicopter crash in Tennessee on Tuesday. The aircraft went down after it hit a power line.
articles.content:
A Tennessee Highway Patrol (THP) trooper and a Marion County sheriff's deputy were killed in a tragic helicopter crash in eastern Tennessee, officials said.

articles.title: Judge gives Trump until Friday to better explain why he wants a special master for Mar-a-Lago documents

articles.title: 2 New York Democrats ousted from US House in primary losses

articles.title: Democrat Pat Ryan wins New York special election in swing district running on abortion message

articles.title: Video: Ring leader behind Michigan Governor kidnap plot ordered explosives from FBI agent - CNN Video
articles.description: A federal jury found two men guilty of conspiring to kidnap Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer in 2020. Prosecutors say the ring leader behind the plan ordered over $4,000 in explosives from an undercover FBI agent. CNN's Jean Casarez reports.
